Conveyancing

Through Openwork Conveyancing, we can introduce clients to a panel of more than 50 solicitor firms across the UK who compete on price and service for Sale, Purchase and Remortgage work. This extensive range of conveyancing products offers choice and flexibility for every client.

For many transactions, we can also include DigitalMove at no extra cost, enabling:

  • Digital document signing and ID verification for speed and your convenience
  • Minimised risk of fraud through less reliance on emails
  • Improved communication and transparency between you and your case handler

Will Writing

A will is a cornerstone of sound financial planning and it is something we believe all clients should have in place. We refer clients to Co-op Legal Services who provide award winning, fixed fee estate planning services, on the phone, online and face to face.

Bridging & second charge loans

We provide access to a range of specialist finance for our clients when their borrowing needs fall outside of our areas of expertise.

Commercial mortgages

We have access to four specialist brokerages who can support you in finding the best commercial mortgage deal from their own lender panels.

Equity Release

Our referral partner for Equity Release is Key Partnerships, the UK’s number one advice firm in the Equity Release sector.

Annuities

JUST will strive to offer their best quote for our clients, however inevitably there will circumstances which mean a higher income may be available through another provider. To cater for this situation, we can introduce you to Hub Financial Solutions who can offer a whole of market advised service to help you secure the right annuity income for your retirement.

Specialist general insurance

We can refer clients to specialist insurance brokerages for a wide range of commercial and non-standard insurance, including:

  • Commercial landlords
  • Blocks of Flats
  • Unoccupied properties
  • Properties in a Company Name
  • House in Multiple Occupation’s
  • Property Portfolio’s (Of any size)
  • Public liability and Employer’s liability
  • Commercial Combined (Factories/Warehouses)
  • Shops/Offices
  • Professional Indemnity

YOUR PROPERTY MAY BE REPOSSESSED IF YOU DO NOT KEEP UP REPAYMENTS ON A MORTGAGE OR ANY OTHER DEBT SECURED ON IT.
SOME BUY TO LET MORTGAGES ARE NOT REGULATED BY THE FINANCIAL CONDUCT AUTHORITY.
Commercial mortgages and some bridging finance are not regulated by the Financial Conduct Authority.

You will need to take legal advice before releasing equity from your home as Lifetime Mortgages and Home Reversion plans are not right for everyone. This is a referral service.

Will writing is not part of The Openwork Partnerships’ services and is offered in our own right. The Openwork Partnership accepts no responsibility for this aspect of our business. Will writing is not regulated by the Financial Conduct Authority.
